ttp_template:
<group name="vlan_id_stg_mac_aging_ip_address">
{{VLAN_ID | re("\\d+")}} {{STG}} {{MAC_AGING | re("[0-9a-fA-F:.-]+")}} {{IP_ADDRESS | ORPHRASE}} 
</group>
<group name="vlan_id_vlan_name_stg_mac_aging_ip_address">
{{VLAN_ID | re("\\d+")}} {{VLAN_NAME | ORPHRASE}} {{STG}} {{MAC_AGING | re("[0-9a-fA-F:.-]+")}} {{IP_ADDRESS | ORPHRASE}} 
</group>
cli_content:
VLAN Name                             STG   MAC Aging IP Address         
---- -------------------------------- ----  --------- ------------------ 
1                                     0     1800      unassigned         
12                                    0     1800      10.10.10.254/24    
13   thirteen                         0     1800      192.168.100.0/22         
14   fourteen                         0     1800      unassigned         
15   fifteen                          0     1800      unassigned         
67   sixty seven                      0     1800      unassigned
textfsm_template:
Value VLAN_ID (\d+)
Value VLAN_NAME (\S+(\s\S+)*)
Value STG (\d+)
Value MAC_AGING (\d+)
Value IP_ADDRESS ((?:[0-9]{1,3}\.){3}[0-9]{1,3}(/\d{1,2})?|\w+)

Start
  ^\s*VLAN\s+Name -> VLAN

VLAN
  ^\s*${VLAN_ID}\s+${VLAN_NAME}?\s+${STG}\s+${MAC_AGING}\s+${IP_ADDRESS} -> Record
